topic.title: Plan Of Care Section - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Plan Of Treatment Section2

The Plan of Care section contains data that defines pending orders, interventions, encounters, services, and procedures for the patient. It is limited to prospective, unfulfilled, or incomplete orders and requests only, which are indicated by the @moodCode of the entries within this section. All active, incomplete, or pending orders, appointments, referrals, procedures, services, or any other pending event of clinical significance to the current care of the patient should be listed unless constrained due to privacy issues. The plan may also contain information about ongoing care of the patient and information regarding goals and clinical reminders. Clinical reminders are placed here to provide prompts for disease prevention and management, patient safety, and health-care quality improvements, including widely accepted performance measures. The plan may also indicate that patient education was given or will be provided.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10435 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14749)/@code="18776-5" Treatment plan (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:14750)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:16986, R2.0=CONF:1098-16986)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7725, R2.0=CONF:1098-7725)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7726.CONF:8804)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8805, CONF:8806)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Encounter (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.40)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8808, CONF:8807)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8809, CONF:8810)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.41)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8811, CONF:8812)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8813, CONF:14756)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Supply (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.43)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:14695, CONF:16751)
Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14749)/@code="18776-5" Treatment plan (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:14750)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:16986, R2.0=CONF:1098-16986)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7725, R2.0=CONF:1098-7725)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7726.CONF:8804)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8805, CONF:8806)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Encounter (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.40)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8808, CONF:8807)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8809, CONF:8810)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.41)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8811, CONF:8812)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8813, CONF:14756)
Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Supply (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.43)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:14695, CONF:16751)
Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

entry.xref: Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration
